TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit PropertyDescriptor extends System.ComponentModel.MemberDescriptor
Public MustInherit Class PropertyDescriptor Inherits MemberDescriptor
public ref class PropertyDescriptor abstract : System::ComponentModel::MemberDescriptor

summary.span: 提供类的属性的抽象。

span.span: Provides an abstraction of a property on a class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的说明包含名称、其特性、与属性关联的组件类，以及属性的类型。A description of a property consists of a name, its attributes, the component class that the property is associated with, and the type of the property. 提供以下属性和方法： provides the following properties and methods: - 包含此属性的 。 contains the for this property. - 指示此属性是否应本地化。 indicates whether this property should be localized. - 返回指定类型的编辑器。 returns an editor of the specified type. 还提供以下 `abstract` 属性和方法： also provides the following `abstract` properties and methods: - 包含此属性绑定到的组件的类型。 contains the type of component this property is bound to. - 指示此属性是否为只读。 indicates whether this property is read-only. - 获取属性的类型。 gets the type of the property. - 指示重置组件是否更改组件的值。 indicates whether resetting the component changes the value of the component. - 返回组件上属性的当前值。 returns the current value of the property on a component. - 重置组件的此属性的值。 resets the value for this property of the component. - 将组件的值设置为一个不同的值。 sets the value of the component to a different value. - 指示是否需要保留此属性的值。 indicates whether the value of this property needs to be persisted. 通常，`abstract` 成员是通过反射实现的。Typically, the `abstract` members are implemented through reflection. 有关反射的详细信息，请参阅[反射](/dotnet/framework/reflection-and-codedom/reflection)中的主题。For more information about reflection, see the topics in [Reflection](/dotnet/framework/reflection-and-codedom/reflection). ## Examples 下面的代码示例基于 类中的示例生成。The following code example is built upon the example in the class. 它在文本框中打印按钮文本的信息（类别、说明、显示名称）。It prints the information (category, description, display name) of the text of a button in a text box. 它假定 `button1` 和 `textbox1` 已在窗体中实例化。It assumes that `button1` and `textbox1` have been instantiated on a form. [!code-cpp[PropertyDescriptor#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PropertyDescriptor/CPP/propertydescriptor.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[PropertyDescriptor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PropertyDescriptor/CS/propertydescriptor.cs#1)] [!code-vb[PropertyDescriptor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PropertyDescriptor/VB/propertydescriptor.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何实现一个自定义属性说明符，该说明符提供围绕属性的只读包装。The following code example shows how to implement a custom property descriptor that provides a read-only wrapper around a property. `SerializeReadOnlyPropertyDescriptor` 在自定义设计器中用于为控件的 属性提供只读属性说明符。The `SerializeReadOnlyPropertyDescriptor` is used in a custom designer to provide a read-only property descriptor for the control's property. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor/CS/SerializeReadOnlyPropertyDescriptor.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor/VB/SerializeReadOnlyPropertyDescriptor.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何在自定义设计器中使用 `SerializeReadOnlyPropertyDescriptor`。The following code examples show how to use the `SerializeReadOnlyPropertyDescriptor` in a custom designer. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor/CS/DemoControlDesigner.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor/VB/DemoControlDesigner.vb#10)] [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor/CS/DemoControl.cs#100)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor/VB/DemoControl.vb#100)]

A collection of property descriptor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法为 `instance` 参数和 `filter` 参数传递 `null`。This method passes `null` for both the `instance` parameter and the `filter` parameter. `instance` 参数的属性可能不同于类的属性，因为如果 `instance` 参数已占位，则容器可以添加或移除属性。The properties for the `instance` parameter can differ from the properties of a class, because the container can add or remove properties if the `instance` parameter is sited. `filter` 参数可以混合使用 和 对象。The `filter` parameter can mix and objects. 筛选由以下规则定义：Filtering is defined by the following rules: - 对象将被视为通配符;它匹配其属性集中具有 的任何属性。A object is treated as a wildcard; it matches any property that has the in its set of attributes. - 如果属性没有相同类的 ，则返回的数组中将不包含该属性。If a property does not have an of the same class, the property will not be included in the returned array. - 如果该特性是 的实例，则该属性必须是要在返回的数组中包含的精确匹配项。If the attribute is an instance of , the property must be an exact match to be included in the returned array. - 如果指定 并且它是默认属性，则该属性将包含在返回的数组中，即使属性中没有 的实例也是如此。If you specify an and it is the default property, it will be included in the returned array, even if there is no instance of in the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法传递 `instance` 参数 `null`。This method passes `null` for the `instance` parameter. `instance` 参数的属性可能不同于类的属性，因为如果 `instance` 参数已占位，则站点可以添加或删除属性。The properties for the `instance` parameter can differ from the properties of a class, because the site can add or remove properties if the `instance` parameter is sited. `filter` 参数可以混合使用 和 对象。The `filter` parameter can mix and objects. 筛选由以下规则定义：Filtering is defined by the following rules: - 对象将被视为通配符;它匹配其属性集中具有 的任何属性。A object is treated as a wildcard; it matches any property that has the in its set of attributes. - 如果属性没有相同类的 ，则返回的数组中将不包含该属性。If a property does not have an of the same class, the property will not be included in the returned array. - 如果该特性是 的实例，则该属性必须是要在返回的数组中包含的精确匹配项。If the attribute is an instance of , the property must be an exact match to be included in the returned array. - 如果指定 实例并且它是默认属性，则即使属性中没有 的实例，它也将包含在返回的数组中。If you specify an instance and it is the default property, it will be included in the returned array even if there is no instance of the in the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，此方法是通过反射实现的。Typically, this method is implemented through reflection. 此方法按以下优先级顺序确定要将属性重置为的值：This method determines the value to reset the property to in the following order of precedence: 1. 此属性有一个隐藏属性。There is a shadowed property for this property. 2. 此属性有一个 。There is a for this property. 3. 已实现 "ResetMyProperty" 方法，其中 "T.myproperty" 是传递给它的属性的名称。There is a "ResetMyProperty" method that you have implemented, where "MyProperty" is the name of the property you pass to it. 此方法按以下顺序自动创建 ：This method creates a automatically in the following order: 1. 方法调用 方法来创建新的 以表示更改。The method calls the method to create a new to represent the changes. 2. 方法调用 方法，以指示事务已开始，即将发生更改。The method calls the method to indicate that the transaction has begun and the changes are about to occur. 3. 方法将属性重置为此方法的检查顺序确定的值。The method resets the property to the value determined by this method's checking order. 4. 方法调用 方法以指示已发生更改。The method calls the method to indicate that the changes have occurred. 5. 方法调用 以指示事务已完成。The method calls to indicate that the transaction is completed. 事务的目的是支持 `Undo` 和 `Redo` 功能。The purpose of the transaction is to support `Undo` and `Redo` functionality.

para.span: 当在派生类中重写时，此方法将查找 。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, this method looks for a .

para.span: 如果找到一个，它会将属性的值设置为找到的 。

span.span: If it finds one, it sets the value of the property to the it found.

para.span: 如果此方法找不到 ，则将查找需要实现的 "ResetMyProperty" 方法。

span.span: If this method cannot find a , it looks for a "ResetMyProperty" method that you need to implement.

para.span: 如果找到这种情况， 方法会调用它。

span.span: If this is found, the method invokes it.

para.span: 如果 找不到已实现的 或 "ResetMyProperty" 方法，则不会执行操作。

span.span: If cannot find a or a "ResetMyProperty" method that you implemented, it does not perform an operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，此方法是通过反射实现的。Typically, this method is implemented through reflection. 此方法按以下顺序自动创建 ：This method creates a automatically in the following order: 1. 方法调用 方法来创建新的 以表示更改。The method calls the method to create a new to represent the changes. 2. 方法调用 方法，以指示事务已开始，即将发生更改。The method calls the method to indicate that the transaction has begun and the changes are about to occur. 3. 方法将属性重置为此方法的检查顺序确定的值。The method resets the property to the value determined by this method's checking order. 4. 方法调用 方法以指示已发生更改。The method calls the method to indicate that the changes have occurred. 5. 方法调用 以指示事务已完成。The method calls to indicate that the transaction is complete. 事务的目的是支持 `Undo` 和 `Redo` 功能。The purpose of the transaction is to support `Undo` and `Redo` functionality.

para.span: 如果指定的值无效，则该组件应引发异常，该异常会向上传递。

span.span: If the value specified is not valid, the component should throw an exception, which is passed up.

para.span: 你应设计属性，以便在 "SetMyProperty" 方法之后的 "GetMyProperty" 方法（已实现）在 "SetMyProperty" 方法不引发异常时返回传入的值。

span.span: You should design the property so that a "GetMyProperty" method (that you have implemented) following a "SetMyProperty" method returns the value passed in when the "SetMyProperty" method does not throw an exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示此属性的值更改通知是否源自属性说明符的外部（例如来自组件本身），或通知是否仅源自对 方法的直接调用。The property indicates whether value change notifications for this property may originate from outside the property descriptor, such as from the component itself, or whether notifications will only originate from direct calls made to the method. 例如，组件可以实现 接口，或可能具有此属性的显式 `name.Changed` 事件。For example, the component may implement the interface, or may have an explicit `name.Changed` event for this property.
